rooms.name: Spawn Room
descriptions: You are in a inside of a room with 4 walls. There are family pictures on all of the walls and a few torches on the walls. You can see a sword, shield, bow, and a spear. the room has one exit leading West.

You are in a inside of a room with 4 walls. There are family pictures on all of the walls and a few torches on the walls. You can see a sword, shield, bow, and a spear. the room has one exit leading West.

You are in a inside of a room with 4 walls. There are family pictures on all of the walls and a few torches on the walls. You can see a sword, shield, bow, and a spear. the room has one exit leading West.

rooms.name: Test Dummy Room
descriptions: You are in a room with a skeleton in the middle with one exit heading West. The room is filled with a bunch of pots and a statue of Hades and a few torches.
You are in a room with a skeleton in the middle with one exit heading West. The room is filled with a bunch of pots and a statue of Hades and a few torches.
You are in a room with a skeleton in the middle with one exit heading West. The room is filled with a bunch of pots and a statue of Hades and a few torches.

rooms.name: Boon Room
descriptions: You are in a room with three glowing boons. The room has one exit heading West. The Room has three statues of different gods and a few torches and family picture.
You are in a room with three glowing boons. The room has one exit heading West. The Room has three statues of different gods and a few torches and family picture.
You are in a room with three glowing boons. The room has one exit heading West. The Room has three statues of different gods and a few torches and family picture.

rooms.name: F1 1st Attack Room
descriptions: You enter a room with some monsters inside of it with a few gold coins scattered about along with some pots. The room seems old and creepy very dimly lit with torches and a stony and dusty floor with two exits heading West and South.

You enter a room with a few monsters inside of it with a couple of gold coins scattered everywhere along with a few pots. The room seems vibrant with the river of souls beside it lighting up the room and the two exits heading West and South.

You enter a room with a couple monsters inside of it with some gold coins scattered around along with a couple pots. The room looks really old with cracked bricks and a dusty floor with only a few torches lighting the room up and the only exits heading West and South.

rooms.name: F1 2nd Attack Room
descriptions: You have entered a room with a couple of monsters inside of it with some pots laying around on the ground. The room seems very eerie with a couple of lanterns hung up glowing purple with what looks to be souls inside of it screaming and cracked bricks around the room with the only exits heading West and North.

You have entered a room with some monsters inside of it with some pots scattered around the ground. The room has a nice view of the river of souls beside it lighting up the room with stone flooring that is cracked and two exits heading West and North.

You have entered a room with a few monsters inside of it with some pots around the room on the ground. The room seems very creepy and old with a old ruined style as the room looks like its going to fall apart with only a few dimly lit torches lighting it up and broken stone bricks and two exits heading West and North.

rooms.name: F1 3rd Attack Room
descriptions: You enter a room with some monsters inside of it with a few gold coins scattered about the room. The room seems old and creepy very dimly lit with lanterns with what looks to be screaming souls inside of it and a stony and dusty floor with two exits heading West and South.

You enter a room with a few monsters inside of it with a couple of gold coins scattered everywhere. The room seems vibrant with the river of souls beside it lighting up the room and the two exits heading West and South.

You enter a room with a couple monsters inside of it with some gold coins scattered around. The room looks really old with cracked bricks and a dusty floor with only a few torches lighting the room up and the only exits heading West and South.

rooms.name: F1 NPC Room
descriptions: You enter a room with a big bulky man with a chain attached to his leg and connected to a giant boulder behind him. The room is a big room filled with stone and a pickaxe with green lighting coming from lanterns that seem to be souls with the only exit heading West.

You enter a room with a big bulky man with a chain attached to his leg and connected to a giant boulder behind him. The room is a big room filled with stone and a pickaxe with green lighting coming from lanterns that seem to be souls with the only exit heading West.

You enter a room with a big bulky man with a chain attached to his leg and connected to a giant boulder behind him. The room is a big room filled with stone and a pickaxe with green lighting coming from lanterns that seem to be souls with the only exit heading West.

rooms.name: MiniBoss Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see two giant bony skeletons with bombs in their hands and explosion marks and ash all over the room with broken pots and ash. Behind the skeletons you can see a glowing boon and the only exit to the room heading West.

As you enter the room you can see two giant bony skeletons with bombs in their hands and explosion marks and ash all over the room with broken pots and ash. Behind the skeletons you can see a glowing boon and the only exit to the room heading West.

As you enter the room you can see two giant bony skeletons with bombs in their hands and explosion marks and ash all over the room with broken pots and ash. Behind the skeletons you can see a glowing boon and the only exit to the room heading West.

rooms.name: F1 4th Attack Room
descriptions: You enter a room with a couple of skeletons looking at you with bones around the room and some gold coins with a few dimly lit torches. The only exits out of the room are heading West and South.

You enter a room with a few skeletons looking off in the distance at the river of souls lighting up the otherwise bland room with a few bones laying around the room. The only exits out of the room are heading West and South.

You enter a eerie room with some skeletons walking around the two exits heading South and West. The room has a couple of bones laying around and the room being lit up by a couple of lanterns with souls screaming inside of it.

rooms.name: F1 5th Attack Room
descriptions: You have entered a room with a couple of monsters inside of it with some pots laying around on the ground. The room seems very eerie with a couple of lanterns hung up glowing green with what looks to be souls inside of it screaming and cracked bricks around the room with the only exits heading West and North.

The room seems very creepy and old with a old ruined style as the room looks like its going to fall apart with only a few dimly lit torches lighting it up and broken stone bricks and two exits heading West and North.

rooms.name: F1 6th Attack Room
descriptions: You enter a room with some skeletons inside of it with a few gold coins scattered about along with some pots. The room seems old and creepy very dimly lit with torches and a stony and dusty floor with two exits heading West and South.

You enter a room with a few skeletons inside of it with a couple of gold coins scattered everywhere along with a few pots. The room seems vibrant with the river of souls beside it lighting up the room and the two exits heading West and South.

You enter a room with a couple skeletons inside of it with some gold coins scattered around along with a couple pots. The room looks really old with cracked bricks and a dusty floor with only a few soul lanterns lighting the room up and the only exits heading West and South.

rooms.name: F1 Shop Room
descriptions: You are in a room with a big tall what looks to be a man in a cloak with bright purple eyes holding a staff. He gestures to you with his bony hand to come to him with a bunch of items beside him. The only exit out of the room is behind him heading west.

You are in a room with a big tall what looks to be a man in a cloak with bright purple eyes holding a staff. He gestures to you with his bony hand to come to him with a bunch of items beside him. The only exit out of the room is behind him heading west.

You are in a room with a big tall what looks to be a man in a cloak with bright purple eyes holding a staff. He gestures to you with his bony hand to come to him with a bunch of items beside him. The only exit out of the room is behind him heading west.

rooms.name: Boss Room
descriptions: You enter a room with a bunch of scratch marks and bones everywhere. the only way out you can see is up which is a stair case leading up with a cliff up top with the room being lit up by a bunch of soul lanterns glowing red and screaming.

You enter a room with a bunch of scratch marks and bones everywhere. the only way out you can see is up which is a stair case leading up with a cliff up top with the room being lit up by a bunch of soul lanterns glowing red and screaming.

You enter a room with a bunch of scratch marks and bones everywhere. the only way out you can see is up which is a stair case leading up with a cliff up top with the room being lit up by a bunch of soul lanterns glowing red and screaming.

rooms.name: F2 Starting Room
descriptions: As you go up the stairs you can see a nice room leading a bit higher to another room heading West. The room seems very well kept lit up by soul lanterns that are glowing green with a small fountain right beside the exit. The stone on the fountain spells out healing fountain.

As you go up the stairs you can see a nice room leading a bit higher to another room heading West. The room seems very well kept lit up by soul lanterns that are glowing green with a small fountain right beside the exit. The stone on the fountain spells out healing fountain.

rooms.name: F2 1st Attack Room
descriptions: As you enter the old, decrepit room you can see a bunch of cobwebs around the room with exits heading East and South. The room is dimly lit with soul lanterns lighting up the room in a green glow and a few coins scattered around the room.
As you enter the room you can see a bunch of cobwebs in the room with exits heading East and South. The room is dimly with torches lighting up the room with a bunch of coins around the room.

As you enter the old room you see some cobwebs around the room with exits heading East and South. The rom is dimly lit with soul lanterns lighting up the room in a green glow and a bunch of coins scattered around the room.

rooms.name: F2 2nd Attack Room
descriptions: You enter a room filled with some spiders with exits heading East and North. The room has some spider parts around the room with some coins the room is dimly lit with torches.
You enter a room with a few monsters with exits heading East and North. The room has a few spider parts around the room with coins the room is being lit up by soul lanterns glowing blue.
You enter a room with a couple spiders with exits heading East and North. The room has a couple of spider parts scattered around and coins the room is being lit up by soul torches glowing orange.

rooms.name: F2 NPC Room
descriptions: As you enter the room it is brightly lit up with soul torches glowing orange and looks very well cleaned. The room has a tall women standing beside some pots with fruits and a exit heading East. The room seems to have everything one would need to live with a fire place bed and all kinds of other pieces of furniture.

As you enter the room it is brightly lit up with soul torches glowing orange and looks very well cleaned. The room has a tall women standing beside some pots with fruits and a exit heading East. The room seems to have everything one would need to live with a fire place bed and all kinds of other pieces of furniture.

The room seems to have everything one would need to live with a fire place bed and all kinds of other pieces of furniture.

rooms.name: MiniBoss Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you feel very creeped out as the room is being very dimly lit up with green soul torches with the only exit to the room heading East and a boon beside it. The room is filled to the brim with cobwebs and dead spider parts with stone walls that look old and cracked and a pit in the middle of the room.

As you enter the room you feel very creeped out as the room is being very dimly lit up with green soul torches with the only exit to the room heading East and a boon beside it. The room is filled to the brim with cobwebs and dead spider parts with stone walls that look old and cracked and a pit in the middle of the room.

The room is filled to the brim with cobwebs and dead spider parts with stone walls that look old and cracked and a pit in the middle of the room.

rooms.name: F2 Shop Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see a man you have seen before with bright purple eyes holding a staff. The man gesture for you to come to him with items beside him. Around the room you can see cages with souls in the with the room being lit up by purple soul torches that seem to be screaming with the only exit heading East.

As you enter the room you can see a man you have seen before with bright purple eyes holding a staff. The man gesture for you to come to him with items beside him. Around the room you can see cages with souls in the with the room being lit up by purple soul torches that seem to be screaming with the only exit heading East.

Around the room you can see cages with souls in the with the room being lit up by purple soul torches that seem to be screaming with the only exit heading East.

rooms.name: Boss Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see a giant tarantula with a glowing boon behind it and the staircase heading Up leading you out of the room. The room is filled with a foul smell and rotting dead spider parts along with cobwebs. The room is being very dimly lit up by red soul torches.

As you enter the room you can see a giant tarantula with a glowing boon behind it and the staircase heading Up leading you out of the room. The room is filled with a foul smell and rotting dead spider parts along with cobwebs. The room is being very dimly lit up by red soul torches.

rooms.name: F3 Starting Room
descriptions: As you go up the stairs you can see more staircases heading west and a small area with a fountain that has a sign that says healing. The room is being lit up torches that are glowing a bright light blue with no walls with a bunch of clouds below you and a sign saying welcome to Elysuim.

As you go up the stairs you can see more staircases heading west and a small area with a fountain that has a sign that says healing. The room is being lit up torches that are glowing a bright light blue with no walls with a bunch of clouds below you and a sign saying welcome to Elysuim.

rooms.name: F3 NPC Room
descriptions: As you enter the brightly lit up room you can see a few statues of old heros carved in stone with a man sitting in the middle of the room. The man is has dark skin with a robe and spear looking as if he is bored and looks at you. The only exit to the room is heading West.

rooms.name: MiniBoss Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you can see blood on the floor along with test tubes with souls in them screaming and lighting up the room in a eerie green glow. As you keep looking around you can see a glowing boon and an exit heading West. In the middle of the room you can see a giant mass of flesh with bloody rusted chains attached to it.

As you keep looking around you can see a glowing boon and an exit heading West. In the middle of the room you can see a giant mass of flesh with bloody rusted chains attached to it.

rooms.name: F3 Shop Room

Around the room you can see cages with souls in the with the room being lit up by purple soul torches that seem to be screaming with the only exit heading West.

rooms.name: Boss Room
descriptions: As you enter the room you just see a massive hallway along the sides you can see stone statues with a man holding a skull with a robe, pouch full of skulls, and scythe. Beside the statues you can see green soul torches lighting up the statue with the wall being filled with skulls leading down the hallway. As you make you're way down the hall you keep seeing the same thing till you see the end with brightly lit up staircase heading up with a glowing boon beside it and the man you kept seeing in the statues. The man is floating guarding the exit with his scythe and pouch full of skulls as he looks at you with his green eyes
